column5: Yet another great show Dave!  Learned a couple of things, and had a few good laughs...some even at your expense  .  I caught my first Walleye using a crank bait...fishing for Pike   so I know how it goes. Not many hosts would put on a show where you're fishing for Walleye and catch more Pike   Good on ya...  For those that missed it, it's on again at 1am  Maureen

I too caught my only walleye/pickeral this spring on a crank bait going after pike.  It was a pleasant surprise.  "Some call it walleye, some call it marble eye, some call it SHORE LUNCH" Dave Mercer.  Best part of the show.
